name: Eraser
effect: Increases all Cloak Checks you make by +2 as long as this Program remains Rezzed.

name: See Ya
effect: Increases all Pathfinder Checks you make by +2 as long as this Program remains Rezzed.

name: Speedy Gonzalvez
effect: Increases your Speed by +2 as long as this Program remains Rezzed.

name: Worm
effect: Increases all Backdoor Checks you make by +2 as long as this Program remains Rezzed.

name: Armor
effect: Lowers all brain damage you would receive by 4 as long as this Program remains Rezzed.

name: Flak
effect: Reduces the ATK of all Non-Black ICE Attacker Programs run against you to 0 as long as this Program remains Rezzed.

name: Shield
effect: Stops the first successful Non-Black ICE Program Effect from dealing brain damage.

name: Banhammer
effect: Does 3d6 REZ to a Non-Black ICE Program--or 2d6 REZ to a Black ICE Program.

name: Sword
effect: Does 3d6 REZ to a Black ICE Program, or 2d6 REZ to a Non-Black ICE Program.

name: DeckKRASH
effect: Enemy Netrunner is forcibly and unsafely Jacked Out of the Architecture, suffering the effect of all Rezzed enemy Black ICE they've encountered in the Architecture as they leave.

name: Hellbolt
effect: Does 2d6 Damage direct to the enemy Netrunner's brain. Multiple instances of this effect cannot stack.

name: Nervescrub
effect: Enemy Netrunner's INT, REF, and DEX are each lowered by 1d6 for the next hour (minimum 1).

name: Poison Flatline
effect: Destroys a single Non-Black ICE Program installed on the Netrunner target's Cyberdeck at random.

name: Superglue
effect: Enemy Netrunner cannot progress deeper into the Architecture or Jack Out safely for 1d6 Rounds.

name: Vrizzbolt
effect: Does 1d6 Damage direct to a Netrunner's brain and lowers the amount of total NET Actions the Netrunner can accomplish on their next Turn by 1 (minimum 2).
